mapper.insert: insert into message(title, receiver_id, sender_id, content, del_receiver, del_sender, send_date, read_check) values(#{message.title},#{message.receiver_id},#{message.sender_id},#{message.content},'N','N' ,now(), 0)
mapper.select: select * from message where receiver_id = #{message.receiver_id} and del_receiver = 'N' order by message_id asc
select * from message where sender_id = #{message.sender_id} and del_sender = 'N' order by message_id asc
mapper.update: update message set read_check = case when receiver_id = #{message.receiver_id} then 1 else read_check end where message_id = #{message.message_id}
update message set del_receiver = 'Y' where message_id = #{message_id}
update message set del_sender = 'Y' where message_id = #{message_id}
